title: when u go AP sona and u finally one shot the kayn that's been camping u all game

replies.body:
Almighty push
_\*Q-AA deletes Kayn\*_
Janna is the one with the shinra tensei attack however, not Sona. And it doesn't even damage!
R Q AA {{summoner:14}}

Hey, the healing scales hard with MOR ap! {{sticker:sona-playing}}

Full AP Sona is so fun!

No idea why she does so much damage though!
Kinda crazy when you compare her to other enchanters.

This was great! I just had a bad game with Kayn earlier today. I was beat up at the beginning of the game, then I was one shot in the middle, and one shot in the end of the game. Your post made me smile.
You were in a genjistu.
i love this new sasuke meme {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

So, Kayn stomps you all game long, probably killed you ten times. Late game, you go full AP, gimping your team by not going support, get 1 kill, then you brag? 

Lol and you use a picture of Sasuke from Naruto. It's so fitting. That ego of your's is showing ^__^
mate, its memes and games
lol its a joke it didnt actually happen

> it didnt actually happen

That's the sad part here
Kayn lacks hatred
i don't
Her expression looks so fucking bloodthirsty I love it.
sasgay <3
Skilled champion
the guy who made this meme is feeling a bit salty that he made it and isnt getting the credit for it Some one told him he should have watermarked it.
wym
not you they guy who made the choking sasuke meme.
